name: vue-app

scripts.test:ai: echo 'Testing AI manifest integration...' && node -e "try { console.log('AI Manifest:', require('@nexcraft/forge/ai-manifest.json')); } catch(e) { console.log('AI Manifest not available in published package'); }"
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist

author: Forge Team
description: AI-Native Forge Components Vue 3 Demo - Showcasing real AI manifest integration and interactive component features
